thread.title: Even the SAT Has Become Political
thread.title_full: Even the SAT Has Become Political - WSJ

author: Trip Apley
title: Even the SAT Has Become Political
text:
As more than six million high-school students do every year, I sat down to take the College Boardâ€™s SAT exam on Dec. 3, 2016. The test was going well until I reached the essay question, which asks students to assess how an author of an article supports his claims.

The basic concept was easy enough, but I was surprised by the source our essay was supposed to be based on. We were asked to analyze a February 2014 Huffington Post article...
